mapper.select: select bmno, bmname, bmtel, bmemail, bmgrade from branch_master where bmemail=#{email} and bmpwd=password(#{password})
mapper.insert: insert into branch_master(bmno, bmname, bmtel, bmemail, bmpwd, bmfbid, bmgrade) values(#{no}, #{name}, #{tel}, #{email}, password(#{password}), #{facebook}, #{grade})
mapper.update: update branch_master set bmno = #{no}, bmname = #{name}, bmtel = #{tel}, bmemail = #{email}, bmpwd = password(#{password}, bmfbid = #{facebook}, bmgrade = #{grade} where bmno=#{no}
